lines: Yo what's goodie
Okay cool beans
buh bye dood
AYOOOOOO
SHERMIE IN DA HOUSE
We may have lost the battle...
but not the war...
ouch! that hurt!
Ah! Blasted right through the shield!
Player, we're being invaded by malware!
Help me take them out so we don't lose our jobs!
NoooooOOOOoOOOoOOOO!!!
Welcome to Sandbox Mode!
Click the buttons on the top right to spawn enemies!
Shermie's adventure begins at the peaceful Navitend Farm.
A place of harmony, soon to be disturbed by the shadow of The Nexus.
Little did Shermie know, his world was about to change forever.
As the sun sets, a strange silence falls over the farm, heralding the onset of chaos.
Shermie looks up, sensing the impending threat, ready to protect his home.
The city is under siege! Buildings crumble under the digital assault of The Nexus.
Shermie must navigate through the chaos to save his friends.
Streets once filled with joy are now battlegrounds of despair.
The Nexus's cyber minions swarm, exploiting every vulnerability.
With each step, Shermie vows to restore peace to the city's heart.
Ascending beyond the city's turmoil, Shermie finds himself amidst the clouds,
determined to halt the invaders' advance before they reach space.
Surrounded by the vastness of the sky, he faces the enemy's aerial fleet,
Each cloud a witness to the fierce battle between hope and despair.
With the wind as his ally, Shermie maneuvers through this ethereal battlefield,
His resolve as strong as the thunder, striking fear into the heart of the enemy.
This skyward clash is but a prelude to the greater war looming in the stars.
Now in orbit, Shermie defends Earth from a relentless barrage,
shielding his home from the debris of war and cyber threats.
Each missile intercepted, each enemy vanquished, brings hope.
Earth hangs in the balance, its fate tied to Shermie's bravery.
The orbit becomes a dance of danger and defiance, Shermie leading the way.
The chase continues back to the enemy's lair, the boss spaceship.
Shermie's resolve hardens against the cold backdrop of space.
The enemy's stronghold looms large, a dark fortress of digital doom.
Inside, The Nexus concocts its final plans for galaxy-wide domination.
Shermie prepares for the onslaught, a beacon of hope against the darkness.
Facing the ultimate defense outside the boss enemy spaceship,
Shermie prepares for the final confrontation with The Nexus.
The silence of space is shattered by the clash of wills.
Shermie's determination lights up the void, a challenge to the darkness.
This is more than a battle; it's a fight for the soul of the galaxy.
Inside the heart of darkness, Shermie faces The Nexus,
a vile entity hacking planets across the galaxy. This is the final battle.
With every fiber of his being, Shermie stands defiant against the looming threat.
The Nexus, a network of malice, meets its match in the heart of a hero.
This battle will decide the fate of countless worlds, Shermie's courage their last hope.
